name: ChatGPT - simple coding UI
description:
To be used in conjunction with TamperMonke to add a navbar toggle:
Javascript code: https://github.com/shane-russell/chat.openai.com_UI_improvements/blob/main/tampermonkeyScript.js 

Install TamperMonkey: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tampermonkey/dhdgffkkebhmkfjojejmpbldmpobfkfo?hl=en

This CSS allows more text/code to fit on screen, fixes that annoying bug with the scrollbar disseapearing behind the input field and makes the scrollbar wider so you can actually click it.
